FuncDef: The display erps interface command displays ERPS information about a port that has been added to an ERPS ring. The display erps interface command displays ERPS information about a port that has been added to an ERPS ring. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the port.
-

Specifies the type of the port.
-

Specifies the number of the port.
-

Specifies the ID of the ERPS ring to which the port has been added.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 255.
